description.narrative: By 2014, the engagement and capacity of civil society actors to develop and implement integrated communication strategies that address social norms and promote positive behaviour change among boys and girls and their families is strengthened.,which contributes to Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Policy, Guidance And Technical Support For Country Programming And Reporting, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Partnerships with national & state media, civil society and donors are strengthened to advocate and promote child rights ( MER / C4D )

HQ and RO technical support to multiple Goal Areas
